dac50a0d-c555-4a6e-89d4-076849819e14:
Dragonheir scion can frighten her enemies.
Benefit: You can perform a bewildering show of prowess as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}. Make a {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} (intimidate) {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} to demoralize all foes within 30 feet who can see your display.
